subject: Medicine
title: Heart Attacks
description: Learn Heart Attacks in one minute.

hook.text: A heart attack is not the same as the heart stopping.

buildup.text: It happens when a coronary artery becomes blocked by a clot.

discovery.text: Heart muscle downstream of the block starts to die.

twist.text: Symptoms can be as subtle as jaw pain or nausea.

climax.text: Fast treatment can reopen the artery and save the muscle.

punchline.text: Minutes decide how much heart survives.

quiz.question: What directly causes a heart attack?
